title: KDP Keyword Guide for Low and No Content Kindle Publishing - Keyword Research Tips
description:
This video talks all about keywords in your KDP low and no content book listings. Where to use them, how to use them, what you should and shouldn’t do. If you have been struggling with how to format your listing in order to include relevant keywords, or you have had queries about how to optimise your listings with keywords, then this video should help answer your questions.
